title: Magical Pumpkin Seed
info: The Magical Pumpkin Seed summons a pet Squashling. Like most other pets, the Squashling does not deal damage to enemies or other players, nor does it take damage, as it simply follows the player around. When the player jumps high enough or outruns the Squashling, it will twirl and fly after the player. When harvesting a fully-grown Pumpkin plant during Halloween, there is a 0.5% (1/200) chance a Magical Pumpkin Seed will drop.
